creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black and white striped band with braided tassels at each end; one end stitched with multicolored diamonds on blue ground; opposite end stitched with irregular zigzags in blue, purple and green highlighted with multicolored diamonds; contemporary paper tag: "100% COTTON/ MADE IN GUATEMALA"
title: Hair band or belt (?)
